MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut affecting the LL31 postcode area of Deganwy, affecting properties in Park Drive, Maelgwun Drive and surrounding streets. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at  10:07PM. Repairs are taking longer than expected because of a fault on the underground cable network and our team are now working to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8:00AM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 12:35AM on 15th January 2021
